scripts.setup: npm install -g webpack && npm install -g webpack-cli && npm install -g karma-cli && cd bundle && npm i && cd ../jasmine-tests && npm i && cd ../npm/test-folder && npm i && cd ../package && npm link && cd ../test-folder && npm link @pdftron/canvas-to-pdf && npm run build
scripts.npm-local-publish: cd npm/package && npm link && cd ../test-folder && npm link @pdftron/canvas-to-pdf && npm run build
scripts.publish-private: npm login && cd npm/package && npm publish
